/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A white van and a yellow car are parked on the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. In the distance, a brick building stands, its red roof contrasting with the surrounding greenery. Above, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The sky itself is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, completing the picturesque scene.
